CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 23, 1945, pg. 26, reads: "Happy Time - It was a happy time at the home of Mrs. Mattie Lee Patterson recently, when her son, EM2/C Adolphus Patterson, arrived home from the Navy. Another son, Pfc. William Patterson, was also home on furlough. A party was given in their honor, with the following people present: Bernice Arrington, Pfc. William Patterson, Geraldine Anderson, EM2/C Adolphus Patterson, Louise Patterson and Marian Arrington. Standing, left to right: Juanita Rolls, Everett White, Edna Anderson, Joe Chatman, Bernice Ford, Billy King, Becky Calloway, Wilbert Gallaway, Lois Ford and Paul Moore. L. T. Wilson and Gloria Sneed are not in the picture. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Guests at party in Patterson home, seated from left: Bernice Arrington, William Patterson in Army uniform, Geraldine Anderson, Adolphus Patterson in Navy sailor uniform, Louise Patterson, Marian Arrington; standing: Juanita Rolls, Everett White, Edna Anderson, Joe Chatman, Bernice Ford, Billy King, Becky Calloway, Wilbert Gallaway, Lois Ford and Paul Moore gathered behind table with punch bowl and bread rolls
